body_html: @ajtulloch I think in that case we could just keep 2 128-bit wide registers as a single value (similarly to how Vec256 is implemented when AVX is disabled). AVX-512 is a completely different thing, but it's unclear if we want to go down this path, considering all the issues with downclocking.
